product_description: VINGLI Wooden Vertical File Cabinet with Wheels and locks - A good space saver for a small apartment! This is a rolling filing cabinet for home office tailored for letter-sized documents. Both 2 drawers are designed with hanging poles that allows files to be neatly hung.The solid board makes the entire cabinet very sturdy, and the design of the independent lock makes your documents stay safe. In addition to the central anti-tipping wheel, the other four wheels of this 2 drawer file cabient with lock are all lockable while the file cabinets in other stores only have two lockable wheels, so that your file cabinets are more flexible when moving and more stable after fixing. The round, stainless steel wire drawing material handles help you avoid being accidentally scratched when you pull that drawers out. If you have small children in the house, the non-sharp design to this rolling file cbainet is especially friendly for them. It has black/white/grey/walnut models for your choices, which ar designed to look stylish and simple business style. That is a plus whether you're working at home or in a company. Don't hesitate to place your order now! About VINGLI VINGLI is committed to providing unique and functional furniture pieces at affordable prices. And our promise is that we will always be here for you should you ever need us as we stand behind our product 100%.
